forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 23C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 72F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 22C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 70F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
